roadmap.title: 60-Day Backend Engineer Learning Roadmap
roadmap.description: Comprehensive backend engineering preparation with Theory → Interview Questions → Hands-on approach. Optimized for Tier-3 companies (Service/Startup/Mid Product) with 2-4 hours daily commitment.
roadmap.targetCompanies: Tier-3 (Razorpay, Swiggy, Urban Company, Postman, Groww, CRED)

days.title: System Design Fundamentals I
days.description: Introduction to distributed systems and architectural patterns

dsaProblems.name: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock

dailyGoals: Understand when to use monolith vs microservices with real examples
Learn scaling strategies and their tradeoffs

days.title: Load Balancing & API Gateway
days.description: Understanding request routing and service boundaries
dailyGoals: Understand load balancing algorithms (Round Robin, Least Connections)
Learn API gateway patterns and benefits

days.title: Service Ownership & Data Flow
days.description: Understanding how data flows through distributed systems

topics.name: Request lifecycle (Client → LB → Service → DB → Cache → Response)

dailyGoals: Map complete request flow through a distributed system
Understand service ownership and bounded contexts

days.title: Synchronous vs Asynchronous Communication
dailyGoals: Understand when to use sync vs async communication

days.title: Read vs Write Heavy Systems
dailyGoals: Design systems for read-heavy vs write-heavy workloads

days.title: Hands-on: Build a Load Balancer
dailyGoals: Build working load balancer in Node.js/Python

days.title: REST API Design Principles

dsaProblems.name: Two Sum II - Input Array Is Sorted

dailyGoals: Learn when to use each status code

days.title: Cache Invalidation
days.description: Solving the hardest problem in CS

topics.name: Delivery semantics (at-most once, at-least once, exactly once)

dsaProblems.name: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
Find First and Last Position of Element in Sorted Array
Remove Nth Node From End of List

days.title: Hands-on: JWT Auth System with RBAC

dsaProblems.name: Search in a Binary Search Tree
Insert into a Binary Search Tree
Kth Largest Element in an Array

days.title: Hands-on: RESTful API + Kafka + Rate Limiter

dsaProblems.name: Kth Smallest Element in a BST
